parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: ControlBehavior
parameters.description:
The throttling effect.

Valid values:

*   0

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    fast failure

    <!-- -->

*   2

    <!-- -->

    :

    <!-- -->

    in queue

    <!-- -->

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the rule.

Valid values:

*   true

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->

*   false

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->

parameters.name: MaxQueueingTimeMs
parameters.description: The timeout period. Unit: milliseconds. This parameter is required when the value of ControlBehavior is set to 2.
